description: This file defines the main React component for the note management application's front-end. It manages state, effects, and rendering of notes, search, editing, and communication with the API.

methods.name: openCreate
methods.description: Opens the note editor for creating a new note.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens the note editor for editing the selected note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving a note, either creating or updating via API, with optimistic UI updates and error handling.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deleting a note through the API with error fallback.
